text: tatha unakee upama, jo apana dhan allaah kee prasannata kee ichchha mein apane man kee sthirata ke saath daan karate hain, us baag (udyaan) jaisee hai, jo prthvee tal ke kisee oonche bhaag par ho, usapar ghor varsha huee, to doguna phal laaya aur yadi ghor varsha nahin huee, to (usake lie) phuhaar hee bas[1] ho tatha tum jo kuchh kar rahe ho, use allaah dekh raha hai
